text: These are the list of results that England have played from 1880 to 1889. No fixtures were fulfilled in 1888 . A standard points scoring system was at the time undeveloped . == 1880 == :Scores and results list England's points tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! Opposing Teams !! For !! Against !! Date !!
